name: supernational
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving more than one country, or having power or authority that is greater than that of single countries: The United Nations is the only supernational authority that is able to solve this problem. Super-national control of taxation is unacceptable to many people.
More examplesFewer examplesThe majority of these organizations are supernational bodies.We must work together to deal with the supernational challenges of our time.Globalization of the economy has created supernational corporations that are not controlled by any government.Super-national cooperation is always difficult to achieve.
